Package com.hazelcast.jet.avro

Class AvroProcessors

java.lang.Object
com.hazelcast.jet.avro.AvroProcessors
public final class AvroProcessors
extends Object
Static utility class with factories of Apache Avro source and sink processors.
Since:
3.0
